message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be highly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a limited budget. Can you meet me in the middle?
I understand you have a budget, Bob, but $11,500 is significantly below its value. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I understand that the product has value, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $13,000. I'd be willing to go up to $12,200, but no higher. Can you meet me at that price?
